flawed_nl_solution:
The number of shoes the factory made was 12000 dolls x 2 shoes/doll = <<12000*2=42000>>42000 shoes
The factory also made for each doll 12000 dolls x 3 bags/doll = <<12000*3=36000>>36000 bags
The set of cosmetics made for each doll was just one, so there are <<12000=12000>>12000 cosmetics sets
Finally, the number of hats for the dolls was 12000 dolls x 5 hats/doll = <<12000*5=60000>>60000 hats
In total, the number of accessories was 42000 + 36000 + 12000 + 60000 = <<42000+36000+12000+60000=150000>>150000 accessories
The dolls took in total 12000 dolls x 45 seconds/doll = <<12000*45=540000>>540000 seconds to be made
All the accessories also took 150000 accessories x 10 seconds/accessory = <<150000*10=1500000>>1500000 seconds
Combing both results, we have that the total time the machinery was working was 1500000 + 540000 = <<1500000+540000=2040000>>2040000 seconds
#### 2040000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24000, not 42000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
